price: 59. Longola sé libota lia Loth, ya sólo tokolongisa bango banso,
arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: illā āla lūṭin innā lamunajjūhum ajmaʿīna
